author: RTÉ News
title: What needs to happen before countries lift lockdowns?
description: What are the conditions that countries should meet before they can start safely easing some of the restrictions imposed due to the Covid-19 outbreak?
content:
With signs in some countries that the coronavirus pandemic may have reached a plateau, governments are looking at how to lift lockdown restrictions on their crippled businesses and restless populations.
But what are the conditions that countries should meet … [+5097 chars]
